person.name: Roofus
person.topic: This bridge ya stupid jerk!Art thou a wise &##!?Thou had best ditch it then!Then just buzz off!

person.name: Rankbreath
person.topic: Yes, I am very hungry!Art thou here to feed me?I am grateful.Then thou had better run!!!

person.name: Sailor
person.topic: Oh, a sailor's life is the life for me,
As I sail across the bounding sea!The rest?And never ever ever do I worry 'bout the weather, for the weather never ever did a thing for me!Oh.

person.name: Silver John
person.topic: We raid the coasts of Britannia, fun eh!Art thou a pirate?Good matey!Thou had best leave this place 'fore there's any trouble!

person.name: Slysam
person.topic: As good as I need be!
Thou dost ask too many questions!Art thou a thief?Oh, I'd better watch out!Just as I thought

person.name: Ragnar
person.topic: The lands of Britannia.Art thou here looking for information?On what?Then buzz off.
Be warned that if thou dost ever use the skull, except to destroy it, all thy virtues will be lost!

person.name: Seanna
person.topic: I am a sorceressMy dear friend, may I help you?How about with thy magic?Ah
How about the sleep spell... sleep... sleep....
A sleep spell requires but one part silk! sleep... sleep... sleep...

person.name: Jeremy James Scirlock
person.topic: How about information?Dost thou seek a special dungeon?Which?I cannot help thee.
The dungeon Hythloth can only be reached by a secret entrance in the great castle.

person.name: Starlight
person.description: A mage dressed all in black.
person.topic: I cast powerful magic missile spells.Dost thou?Thou should try my mix of reagents!Too bad.
Try one black pearl and one part sulfurous ash!

person.name: Brigant
person.topic: Shove it!Did thou hear me?Then do it!I said shove it!

person.name: Boris
person.topic: Magic keys, magic gems, that sort of thing.Dost thou need such an item?I just gave the guild shop a new supply!Ah well, maybe next time.

person.name: Ignap
person.topic: To step into those woods will seal thy doom!
In there lies the dark side, enter not!Shalt thou go on?Evil shall consume thee!Wise decision!

person.name: Green Beard
person.description: A tall pirate with a green beard!
person.topic: I'm buying armour for my crew!
I hope to get some magical plate!Know where to buy mystic armour?Where?Wish I did!

person.name: Marsor
person.topic: I own my own vineyards, they are on an isle northeast of here!Dost thou like wine?Ah, then join me in a glass!Don't know what thou art missing!

person.name: Dancek
person.topic: I am a tinker by trade.
Primarily ship cannons!Dost thou own a ship!Good odds I built the cannons!Thou really should get one!

person.name: Sniflet
person.topic: I... I...Wilt thou promise to use it only to aid the powers of good?The lighter than air device that was stolen lies near the dungeon Hythloth!Oh, no.
